basic.name: Soundwave (Q)
basic.description: Release a burst of sound, dealing damage to enemies in a wide area and knocking them back.

basic.name: Soundboop (?)
basic.description: {highlight}Deal 105 damage to enemies in an area and knock them back. Also knock back allied heroes Share cooldown with Soundwave(Q){/highlight}

basic.name: Crossfade (W)
basic.description: Play one of two tracks that passively provide all nearby allied Heroes with either a speed boost or a heal over time. Switch tracks at will.

basic.name: Amp It Up (E)
basic.description: Increase the volume on Lúcio's Crossfade track, boosting the effects of his songs.

heroic.name: Sound Barrier (R)
heroic.description: Provide a large shield to all nearby allies that rapidly decays over a short period.
passives: {highlight}Sound Barrier cooldown recharges faster based on the current Lucio Movement speed(Minimum of 100%).{/highlight}
{highlight}Sound Barrier refresh wall slide movement speed bonus to the maximum.{/highlight}

heroic.name: High Five (R)
heroic.description: {highlight}activate to slide towards a targeted location, any allied hero hit by the slide will healed by 230 and Lucio by 80 both will also be granted unstoppabble by 1 second.{/highlight}

trait.name: Push Off (T)
trait.description: While moving alongside terrain, activate to slide towards a targeted location. Enemies hit take 100 damage and are Slowed by 75% for 1 second.

1.name: Party Mix
1.description: {highlight}Each Crossfade cast after 5s without casting increases its effectiveness by 10%, range by 7.5%, and Lucio's Mana regeneration by 50%, up to 4 times. Resets when Amp It Up expires.{/highlight}

1.name: Accelerando
1.description: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while Lúcio maintains its effect

1.name: Smooth Moves
1.description: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while Lúcio maintains its effect

4.name: Subwoofer
4.description: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 75% further. Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Soundwave. Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

4.name: Off the Wall
4.description: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave while Wall Ride is active reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

4.name: Supersonic
4.description: While Wall Ride is active, Push Off's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

7.name: Good Vibrations
7.description: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave grants Lúcio a 38 (+4% per level) Shield for 7 seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes grants 3 times this amount

7.name: Reverse Amp
7.description: Blast Lúcio's active Crossfade track at enemy Heroes. While Amp It Up is active, Healing Boost deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost Slows by 20%. This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents

7.name: Boombox
7.description: Place a boombox that plays Lúcio's Crossfade track, adjusting volume with Amp It Up. Tracks don't stack.{highlight} Active: Place on an ally to follow them for 15s (shares cooldown).{/highlight}

10.name: Sound Barrier
10.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point Shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.
passives: {highlight}Cooldown recharges faster based on Lucio's Movement Speed (min 100%){/highlight}
{highlight}Refreshes Wall Ride speed bonus to maximum{/highlight}

10.name: High Five
10.description: {highlight}activate to slide towards a targeted location, any allied hero hit by the slide will healed by 230 and Lucio by 80 both will also be granted unstoppabble by 1 second.(2 charges){/highlight}

13.name: All Together
13.description: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains 5% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses

13.name: Heavy Casters
13.description: Push Off no longer Slows enemies, and instead Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Slip
13.description: While Wall Ride is active, passing near an enemy Hero increases its Movement Speed bonus to 40%, and grants 15 Armor, for 1 second.

16.name: Rejuvenescência
16.description: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum Health each second.

16.name: Up the Frequency
16.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.4 seconds. Passive: Wall Ride increases Basic Attack range by 2.2.

16.name: Summer Anthem
16.description: Activate for allies affected by Crossfade to become Unkillable for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Bossa Nova
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the Shield now decays over 4 seconds.

20.name: Mixing Fire
20.description: High Five can now be cast on enemy Heroes, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and reducing all healing received by 50% for 3 seconds. Passive: Reduce the cost and cooldown of High Five by 30%.

20.name: Push it to the limit
20.description: {highlight}Reduces Push Off cooldown to 8 seconds and give it 2 charges(1 second cooldown between charges){/highlight}

20.name: Up To Eleven
20.description: Amp It Up lasts 1s longer. Hitting enemies with Soundwave or Push-Off during Amp It Up extends its duration by 0.3s. {highlight}Recast Amp It Up to dance for 2s, extending the duration and maintaining Wall Ride speed.{/highlight}
